original_text: And the seventh day must be a holy day and all the people must meet together. You must not work at your jobs on that day.
korean_text: 일곱째 날에는 성회로 모일 것이요 아무 일도 하지 말 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And the seventh day must be a holy day
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이레째 되는 날은 거룩한 날이 되어야 하며

sentences.original_text: and all the people must meet together
You must not work at your jobs on that day
sentences.korean_translation: 그날에는 너희가 직업 일을 하지 말아야 합니다
